import { useCallback, useState } from "react"; import VocabularyItem from "./VocabularyItem"; function VocabularyPage({course, setCourseList}) { const [textInput1,setTextInput1] = useState("") const [textInput2,setTextInput2] = useState("") const [type,setType] = useState("") const [vocabularyList, setVocabularyList] = useState([]) const onTextInputChange1 = useCallback((e) => { setTextInput1(e.target.value) },[]) const onTextInputChange2 = useCallback((e) => { setTextInput2(e.target.value) },[]) const onTypeChange = useCallback((e) => { setType(e.target.value) },[]) const addVocabulary = useCallback((id) => { const vocab = {tuvung:textInput1,loaitu:type,nghiacuatu:textInput2,isHidden:false} console.log(vocab) setVocabularyList([...vocabularyList,vocab]) console.log(vocabularyList) setCourseList(prevState => prevState.map(course => course.id === id ? {...course,vocabularyList: vocabularyList} : course)) },[vocabularyList,textInput1,textInput2]) return ( <>
